verbs.description: The Washington Post [V: has] been tracking all of Donald Trump ’s misleading statements — that is , lies — since the start of the campaign . Today they announced that he has passed the never - before reached 3000 lie mark . A new world record ! How is he not bragging about this ? He brags about every accomplishment , especially when he …
